text: She gave birth to her third child in March and was spotted looking incredible on a beach bikini shoot on Monday. And one day on, Jessie James Decker - a South Beach Diet ambassador - has revealed how nervous she was to strip down for the shoot, also confessing that she's now 10lbs heavier than she was after her second child. Taking to Instagram, the 30 - year - old posted a side - by - side shot of her physique from behind to showcase the differences since starting weight lifting and increasing her protein intake.
